website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option with a comfortable, basic essential features, and simple operation.
pros: Digital display with oversized numbers with EL backlight and afterglow
Durable acrylic face cover and resin band
Chronograph lets you track elapses and split times in 1/100-second increments
cons: Not as durable as other resin band styles, and digits have a block-like, sometimes hard-to-read appearance

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This watch is everything I was looking for. Affordable, chicness, simplicity, right size and just plain cute ! Lol I'm a nursing student and this goes into military time and has many other features. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love this little watch
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfortable and I very much appreciated that it arrived set to the correct time and date. I have a very small wrist and the third setting fits perfectly. I bought this watch specifically to have something waterproof that I could wear while paddle boarding, but it is certainly attractive enough that I won't limit its wear to just when I'm swimming.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon girl

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was great. Wore it while snorkeling, horseback riding and jet skiing. Still looks like new. Very comfortable band. I receive compliments when I wear it. It has a back light that is great when you are in the dark. Four buttons for various features including an alarm clock. I'd recommend it to anyone interested in a water proof watch. I had it in the water about 7 feet deep and no issues and no fogging. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: The first time I stepped into the pool, water ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I stepped into the pool, water leaked into the watch! Water leaks into it every day I'm in a regular swimming pool and now it's starting to affect the words and numbers on the watch. I can't see which day of the week it is or what day of the month it is anymore. If you look at the photo, you can see that it's mostly filled with water with some condensation. I thought this would be a reliable watch but it hardly lasted a month!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first then tossed it after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a silver digital sports watch for the longest time and finally I found it! I absolutely love this watch. It's elegant but casual at the same time. UPDATE: After wearing the watch 24/7 for 3 months months the band began to discolor into a brownish/black shade. As much as I loved the watch I ended up throwing it away because it looked cheap with the faded color.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best watch ever. I got the white watch about a year and a half ago, and since then it has really turned colors so I decided to buy a new one. In the pictures you can see the color change that happened over the year and a half period that it was worn. I have worn this watch 24/7 since Christmas 2015 and it is still going strong. It is water resistant and easily survives showers, swimming, and hiking. It is the cutest waterproof watch I have ever found, and can easily be dressed up with a bracelet. Be warned that the white watch will turn colors, but I definitely still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emma R

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect watch for nurses and nurse aides
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect watch for nurses and nurse aides! I am an aide and a nursing student so I needed a watch that would be okay with water exposure and with being wiped down for sanitation purposes. THIS WATCH IS PERFECT FOR THAT!!!! I literally washed it in the washing machine by accident and it lived. Still works. Much better than my timex weekender watch I bought for the washable band which ticks at an annoyingly loud volume and didn't withstand an accidental wash, hence why this watch was purchased. I hunted around for the perfect replacement watch for a while and I'm super pleased with this one
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased another brand of watch.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Pretty look but that is where it ends. The dial is quite small and is dim despite the "glow" light option (which they recommend not using at it will significantly lower the watch's battery life) so I can't hardly read it. No matter how I have tried to read the instruction, look online for the advice of others, and just plain old push all the buttons in any combination - I cannot get the alarm to change or turn off! I wish I had just gone ahead and purchased a more expensive watch and certainly a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: M Burns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fell apart after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this watch a 5 Star because I love the size and look and everything about it, BUT the silver face came off after 3 days for no reason. I was stepping out of my car and heard a ping on the pavement or I wouldn't have even noticed it coming off. Update: my watch just quit after 4 more days. I am not hard on my watches at all so this was crazy. I liked everything about this watch and maybe just got a lemon. I'm sad that it wasn't made better as its such a nice size color and display.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and it's dead - battery is find but watch is DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 year and 7 days now it's dead. The battery tested fine. I have to pay shipping to get it repaired and include a check for $10 to pay return postage so it's not worth getting it fixed. If you want a disposable watch, this is the one for you. Also, I wanted to replace the band and found that you can't put a standard watch band on it because of the weird way the band connects to the watch. I don't know about you but I'm sure getting tired of all this junky stuff that I keep ordering from Amazon that breaks within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bat Sands

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable, delicate appearance. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts are very good. Looks very nice for a digital sport watch. It doesn't come with instructions, but luckily another reviewer posted them. The rose gold/white option has a silver closure, which is just a little detail. I have a very small wrist and it fits without having to use the tightest hole, therefore I'd assume this would even fit children or adolescents well. The alarm is a medium volume. Maybe not loud enough to wake a heavy sleeper or to hear over a crowd, but it certainly gets my attention under typical circumstances. I have not tested the water resistance yet, I hope I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Changed my tune!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this watch to use on an Alaskan fishing trip because it was water proof. It got moisture in the watch and I could not read the digital display. I went on the Armitron website and found a place in NY to get it repair or replaced. I included a check for $9.95 as noted on the warranty. Armitron replaced my watch and sent my check back. I was very pleasantly surprised they did not keep my check for handling and shipping. I have worn the watch for the past 5 months and it works great. Easy to read and not moisture inside the watch. I would definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jenenne

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: Watch is the right size for my medium sized wrist. Looks good and is pretty. I do like this watch and am overall pleased. I would recommend it, however there are a few things .... The time/date is easy to see, but I do find the display of seconds distracting. I don't think the display size needs to be that large. The directions were wrong, wrong, wrong. Fortunately my husband was able to set it by using the method he uses of setting his running watches.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good watch but NO COUNT DOWN TIMER
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure how to rate this product. I bought it to use for sailboat racing, and I thought it included a count down timer. Looking at the description it did not mention it, but one of the other reviews specifically said timer, so I bought it. Turns out there is no count down timer. So I am returning. This only includes a stopwatch, count up function, be warned! Other than that, it looked nice, although smaller than I had envisioned. I think it would be a good waterproof watch for someone who doesn't need a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarloafer89

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Zero water resistance. Lasted less than three months.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that this stopped working less than three months after I got it, and with minimal exposure to water. Minimal exposure, as in everyday use, and nothing that even came close in any way to the specs listed in the posted description. I didn’t expect it to be waterproof but I did expect it to have SOME resistance. Nope. Zero resistance at all. Not sure if this is a case of an openly false advert or being shipped a random dud. In either case, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Floopity-boopity-doo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Was okay while it worked (although chrome is shiny and has a cheap look). After three months, display is gone blank and buttons don't work but alarm still goes off at noon every day. Yes, Armitron offers a "lifetime warranty" but they require you to pay $9.95 "to cover the cost of handling and return postage." With the postage to send it to them, that's practically the cost of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: maiden voyager

customer_reviews.title: Full-featured watch that is difficult for older people to use
customer_reviews.text: My 94 year-old mother-in-loves this inexpensive water-resistant watch. She wears it in the pool when she teaches water aerobics. She had to buy two of them, one for daylight savings and one for regular times, because they are difficult to set. Much too confusing for one thing, but also physical difficult for arthritic hands. And when the batteries died she got 2 more. (I'm not sure if they would still be water resistent once the battery is opened.). I recommend the watch if you need something inexpensive and water-resistent that looks decent on most people. But be prepared to spend time figuring out how to set it! And turn off any pre-set alarm!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent, inexpensive watch. I got it to wear during physical activity, such as teaching dance and coaching soccer. I also wanted a stopwatch, which this has. The color is nice...my six year old son saw it and said, "That's a great color for a watch!" Usually six year olds are pretty honest. I love the back-light, it's the same color as the band. I can tell the band is slightly discolored after only a few weeks. It's not very noticeable, but I'm glad I didn't go with the white one. Overall, I really like it as a casual watch, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Uppercut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch with the intent of using it during SCUBA dives, and I have not yet used it on a dive. I will update when I have done so. For now though, I have been wearing it during my daily routines on land. It is small, low profile, and comfortable. I have very small wrists, and this watch fits me perfectly. I don't even have to use the smallest setting! The buttons are easy to navigate, especially with the helpful "owners manual" included with it. Update: The watch is amazing. I've taken it down to 65 feet and it holds up flawlessly. I wear it everywhere every day, and I have a friend who wears hers to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Future Astronaut

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a swim
customer_reviews.text: Have had many of these type of watches in the past, and often wear them to keep track of time during swim workouts. This watch was fine for a few weeks of normal (dry) wear but quickly died after 2 short (<30 minute) swims in shallow water. Perhaps I had a defective watch, but I was quite disappointed by the lack of water resistance
customer_reviews.author: Lavender3673

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but will break
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Came already set up in my time zone. The gold and white looks beautiful and classy. Also great to swim with or use at the beach. Edit: I have had this product for 2 months and it is already broken! There was no trauma, it just decided to stop working one day. This is the third product from amitron that has had the same malfunction. I can't buy a new watch every 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Sleek comfortable design with easy to read display
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this digital watch in silver to wear while riding my bike. But it is so beautiful, that I wear it with my entire wardrobe. It has an easy to read display showing the time in hours, minutes, and seconds. It also shows the day of the week and the date, along with AM/PM. The design is sleek with a soft, flexible and sturdy band. It’s comfortable to wear and looks very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little watch for the price. Perfect for everyday wear and tear. So far it's held up to #momlife I love the gold with white.
customer_reviews.author: Love of Art

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first, until the ocean :(
customer_reviews.text: I swim laps at the local pool, and this is perfect for keeping track of my workouts while in the pool. So far so good, no water inside or fog! Also the perfect size for my tiny wrists. It’s very cute. Update: I wore this watch to swim in the ocean and after just a few uses it leaked and stopped working. Bought it a second time thinking maybe it was just a fluke, and ruined the second one. These watches ARE NOT OCEAN-PROOF. :(:(
customer_reviews.author: FrostaCat

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Armitron watch I’ve owned and I love them both, purely because of their functionality and because they are water resistant, so I can wear it to work in a restaurant with no problem. The only thing I hate is the resin strap - it collects dirt so fast and I have tried every method of cleaning in the book but nothing works. The watches looked good for maybe a few days before permanently looking like they were covered in dirt. Armitron, please figure this out!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: How to fix the DAY OF THE WEEK - bad instructions great watch
customer_reviews.text: I had this watch for 4 years in a healthcare setting and only got rid of it when the strap keeper broke. It stood up to soap / water / hand sanitizer galore. So I bought another one. I had to call the company to get help with fixing the DAY of the week and this is how you do it. You must correct the YEAR and then the day of the week sets automatically. If the year is in advance of 2017, just keep pressing the D button (upper right) when you are in 'fix the year' mode and it will scroll back around to 2000. I would give it 5 stars except the instructions are bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love these watches! armitron is a reliable brand myself and children have been using for years on the farm. I just bought this one in white, and gave my 2 yr old black one to my son (who's band just broke after 5 solid years of wear!! He never takes it off through showers or anything! He was hoping to just get a new band, but because of how they're shaped, that's impossible.) The children's were more expensive on Amazon, so this was a way around it at only 12$. (I paid 30 at target for my black one!) Only con is this white one takes on some staining from rubbing against my jeans (on the strap holder).
customer_reviews.author: megan young

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for almost 2yrs. I purchased the white one. I loved it but unfortunately it is coming to its end.. over time the white got tainted making it look dirty and the gold frame has fallen off. But I will say if it was any other color or I didn’t wear it as much it could have lasted longer. It’s a great quality watch and will buy again but a darker color. Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and function but the band already had awful black again after only 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have this watch in like a cream color, and the black armitron which has an oval face. I vastly prefer the way this circle shaped one looks on me and I was going to give it five stars. But I’ve only been wearing it daily for 2 months and it’s got these big black stains on them. I have been washing it in soap which helped fade the stains but not all the way. So I may buy another one but in a darker color. Shame bc I much prefer lighter colors. Also if you’re having trouble setting this, people wrote instructions on reviews. I will repaste later when I am at my computer.
customer_reviews.author: sunnydaysahead

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, small, nice looking & UPDATES
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this watch. It's so easy to read AND it has the date - something I never seem to know. Haven't gone swimming with it yet but it's survived the shower just fine. It's very nice looking and not big. The color depicted on Amazon seems very true, it's a light purple - almost lavender though I'm not sure anybody uses the word "lavender" anymore. UPDATE 11/14/18: Still going strong. Only ONE COMPLAINT and its not unique to this product but seemingly all silicone bands, they get dirty and nothing seems to clean them. Pic attached. UPDATE 12/24/18 I've ordered one with a black band. I can't stand the ugly dirty spots any longer!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Litton

customer_reviews.title: Unable to change time.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I don't even feel it on. Keeps excellent time. I like that it is waterproof so I don't have to remove it to wash my hands. Very practical and cute. Sooo pleased. Update. Time change. Nothing I try will set the time back an hour. The buttons don't seem to work as described. So my watch stays set to an hour later than actually time. Guess I will not be able to use until the next time change. The directions are not that great.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these watches in 3 different colors I love that they are able to be worn while doing things like washing dishes, showering and other things that get your hands submerged in water. Love the feature that illuminates the watch so I can easily see what time it is at night. My only complaint is that the directions for setting the watch do not appear to be accurate. I end up having to just play around with the buttons each time they need to be reset for daylight savings time till I stumble across the correct combo, but as that is only twice a year I can deal with that as I really like them otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Hop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fashionable watch!it fits perfectly and looks very nice,I ordered the Rose gold it's on the pictures!the only reason I am giving it 4 star is I didn't like that the closure is silver instead of rose gold!it arrives on time and It came when an instruction so I posted some pictures of the instructions just in case yours didn't come with one!I will order again definately!hope this help :)
customer_reviews.author: Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but. . .
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and brightness and of course the price of these watches but it does drive me crazy always bumping the outside buttons especially 1. turning the watch on military time and 2. accidentally turning the alarm on which you are not expecting. I do wear my watch on my right hand since I am left-handed. I don't know if this has anything to do with the buttons I bump but it is happening often. OTHERWISE, it is a great watch for the price. Many pretty colors. It keeps the time you set it for correctly. I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Usually I love armitron watches
customer_reviews.text: Usually I love armitron watches, and I have this exact watch in a different color. So, when my daughter needed a new watch, I ordered her one of these, and it broke the first day. We replaced it, and the replacement got water inside and rusted out within a week or two of wear,due simply to showers and swimming in the regular swimming pool while wearing it. Then the buckle broke off completely, as the first one had. Learned our lesson, and replaced it with a different watch altogether.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need for my upcoming vacation to Mexico (in and out of pools, beaches, etc). My grandmother swore by her Armitron Sport watch during her daily pools laps, so I knew it was a reliable brand. It's the perfect size for my wrist. Watch arrived with the correct date and time pre-programmed. Settings are pretty easy to figure out, and instructions are included.
customer_reviews.author: EAF496

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ICU RN
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and I had this watch all through nursing school and now into my 5th year as an RN and if finally bit the dust. I immediately got online to get another one. I got the white one but it just wasn't the same so I reordered this black one. AMAZING. It holds up so well and I love that it's smaller for my baby wrist, so it stays out of the way when I need it to. It's cheap enough that if something happened to it I wouldn't be upset, but so far it's been a total boss.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of this model watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, this is the second time I've bought one. The band on the original finally creased and broke at the spot where I always hook it - not surprised it's several years old - and still running. I like digital, not analogue watches, but most digital watches are huge, even the women's versions. Not this one. Pretty easy to set up as well, unlike most digitals. Love all the different color combos they have now, ordered one in blue this time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my rating from a 5 to a 1. The watch looked good for the price and has military time option. However, after only 45 days, the buckle broke and it is not longer wearable. I called the manufacturer and after getting passed around to various departments was told that they "would take a look it" for a $10 shipping charge. No promise to actually fix it -- and I ended up speaking with very apathetic Armitron employee who did not care the watch broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my vacation. Knew I would be in the water a lot didn't want to use my Apple watch Series 1 in the water. Well, I am very happy with this little watch. Got the silver one and it looks just fine. Easy to read the face. Has the date on top and the seconds on the bottom. You can set an alarm on it as well. The light feature worked well too. I would buy another one. I'm totally happy with this watch, and it's in my rotation with my Apple watch. It's reliable and comfortable. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: DAT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Waterproof! Great for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Waterproof---daily baths, hot tub/pool 2-3 times a week. No issues, had for about 2 months now. We bought 2, one in this light pink color, 1 in purple. We have noticed slight staining on the light-pink strap. None to minimal staining on the purple. See photos. We had to drill an additional hole in the adjustment strap to make it tighter. This was expected as we were putting it on our 3 year old (can't tell time yet, but wanted to be like mommy & daddy & older siblings). I am not afilliated with Amazon or Armitron.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold watch with white band stains like nobody’s business
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the black one for a few years and was pretty impressed. My low review is for the rose gold one specifically. I recently got the white / rose gold, and within ONE day it was staining itself blue— not even sure from what? By day two, it did not look new at all. I tried to clean it with soap and baking soda, nothing worked. Wasted my money on the rose gold one. Not only that, but I found these same watches a few dollars cheaper at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love the small size of this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size of this watch. I am very allergic to jewelry (not sure of which metals specifically) so I always buy plastic or silicone watches and usually I have to add moleskin or shearban tape to cover the metal clasp or metal under the watch part. I have not had to do so with this watch yet and I have even worn it while sleeping. I do wish the clasp was not silver, gold would match the watch face but hey, I'm not complaining for $10. Other pros: -love that is has a glow setting for in the dark. -like that I can program two time zones -shows date -easy enough to use, directions are clear
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I ordered watch and found it is a few minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered watch and found it is a few minutes late. I tried to adjust it but it is impossible. I followed the instructions on the manual very well but it did not work. I decided to return and on the printing return label page nothing showed. There is no return labeling at all. I left a comment and nobody respond....
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Go Retro and Simplify with style
customer_reviews.text: My Garmin watch got lost somewhere in my house and I never found it. Not wanting to spend as much I chose this Armitron for the price, size, it has military time, and can go in water. I love this watch and will never go back to a smart watch again. I can't believe how much the "smart" watch interrupted my day and took me out of the moment of what I was doing. I never have to recharge this one, it's smaller and looks better on my wrist than my old watch. 10/10 highly recommend. p.s. I love the light so I can check the time in the dark and not blast everyone with brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Small, cheap and easy to press buttons BUT strap retainer/loop thingie TOO BIG and LOOSE
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to switch among functions. Some of my other watches are resistant when you press the buttons to switch functions. This one takes less pressure which is easier on the fingers. And it only costs around $16. UPDATE: I had to remove two stars because the strap retainer/loop thingie will NOT stay in place over the end of the wristband so the end is always sticking up "free" with liability of coming undone. They made it too big and loose. I will have to figure out if I can rig it some way to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: LilyBart

customer_reviews.title: Watch itself is ok size wise and looks nice but in hardly over a month of having it ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch itself is ok size wise and looks nice but in hardly over a month of having it the screen went blank. I swapped batteries today thinking that was the problem even though I had only had it a short period of time. A few hours later the watch is blank again and no amount of button pressing will get it to turn back on so I'm considering it useless after hardly even a month...
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great, dainty watch.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about a day now, and I'm in love with it. I was previously using a broken smart watch that wouldn't connect to my phone anymore, so it was just a digital watch at that point. This watch was easy to set the time and date. The back light is gentle and starts on for about 3 seconds, which is great for checking the time in the middle of the night, and avoiding being blinded. I've showered twice with it in, and it's fine. I especially like how dainty it is, compared to a bulky smart watch. If my feelings change about this watch I'll update my review, but as of now it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin magee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this watch and another color in purple since august of 2018. It’s still living and didn’t die. My main purpose to use this watch is because it says it’s water resistant. It says water resistant to snorkeling but then it says it’s not water resistant, which is misleading and confusing as hell. However it’s main purpose for me was to use while washing dogs at work, I’m a dog groomer. It has still held up since buying two years ago, so I will say I’m fully satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: ThatSheWolf

customer_reviews.title: Feminine
customer_reviews.text: I had the tendency of using my cell phone to look at the time, and got sick of doing that, now I wear my watch and in the sun light I can see the time. It's stainless steel, has two different time zones, date, hour, seconds, stop watch, water resistant. Not a huge, bulky mess, like other watches, especially if you have thinner wrists. Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this watch, but they only last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these watches so far and just ordered my third. Each has lasted 2 years and then needed to be replaced. I really can't find another waterproof watch that I like as much, so for the price, I'm okay with the 2-year life. I like it because it has a fairly slender profile, is easy to read, includes the day of week and date, has a good color selection, remains waterproof for a couple of years (I wear it in the pool, the ocean, and the shower) and fits my casual lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Shellfan

customer_reviews.title: Amitron watch no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for several months. Only need it seasonally. My other watch died. I tried to set the time on this one and cannot. Nothing works. It is stuck in military time and also the date is incorrect. Cannot get to that function. It worked when I bought it but it does not work now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Update: Had watch less than 2 months and it’s failing. Went completely blank for a day or two. Then randomly came back on but none of the buttons work. Armitron is sending me a new battery but it looks like a gigantic pain to change. It’s a shame because my daughter wore it daily. Super cute and affordable watch. Bought for my petite 9 year old daughter and it fits her wrist on one of the tightest settings. The white band is starting to show some color from her clothes after just a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: MomofThree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small wrists. Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little watch for the price. I bought the black and silver one and it looks nice. The display is easy to read, the numbers are not too small like some watches. The blue glowing light is nice to have when you wake up and want to see what time it is in the middle of the night. The silicone strap seems durable and looks good. I have small wrists and this fits me well. Perfect size. I may buy more colors of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, but the strap is annoying
customer_reviews.text: First off, for the price, I think this is a great watch. As a nurse, I just need a watch that I don't care too much about, is light-weight, that will help me know the time quickly, and that has a clear seconds display. This fits my needs. I just wish it felt a little more durable. And the strap drives me crazy. The little plastic piece that holds the strap down is constantly slipping down, and the strap sticks out as a result. I'm worried it will just fall off one day. But, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday waterproof watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one...first just stopped working. But I loved the fact it was waterproof and reasonably priced I gave it another try. I wear it in everyday usage. Hands in and out of water, heat and banging around and it's not ugly looking. I'm not a fan of trying to remember what 4 buttons do what but all I needed it for is to see what time it is. Saved the instructions to change the time 2x a year! So if you want an decent looking durable everyday watch at a reasonable price. I didn't grade the timer function as I don't use that.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, attractive and easy read watch.
customer_reviews.text: Super attractive, easy read. Finally found a quality well priced product that allows me to easily see time, day and date with 70 plus years eyes. Seconds I don't use but it is there. The navy colour with the gold trim is very atractive and "goes" with much of my wardrobe. Love it!!! Note: The "B" function is to forward hours. The "C" function is for the very handy light. Postscript: one small negative after several weeks of wear. The strap loop moves and the strap is only held in place by the buckle. So one inch of strap ends up "sticking out" and I'm constantly reinserting the strap end into the inadequate strap loop.
customer_reviews.author: gandy dancer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Server Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: As a server, I desperately need a watch that's water resistant and I LOVE how it has the date along with the time. It can be in normal 12-hour time or in military, 24-hour, time. If you click on the lower left button, it will light up the screen. It was easy to set. The only thing I don't like about it is how it's a little rigid still. It fits my wrist perfectly but if I don't put it to the correct hole, then it slides and stays locked onto the thicker part of my wrist. Thus leaving an indent on my skin. Other than this, it is very comfortable, stylish, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the money! Looks really cute - bought it for my 6th grade daughter and it looks really nice on her. It is completely waterproof as she has worn it swimming a million times in the past 4 weeks and it's held up really well so far. Update 9/2 - my daughter hasn't taken this off in over 10 weeks and loves it. it really looks nice and has held up in the pool, shower, ocean, river and bay - we have put it to the test and its still ticking!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: A bit of good design
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sleek design that is easy to use. I have had many sport watches over many years and used them for timing everything from running intervals to boiling eggs. I have used their alarms and even to tell time. This watch is small and so it is a good size for my small wrist. The numbers are easily visible, even without my glasses and the silver and blue looks nice. It is not bulky and complex as many sport/digital watches are. I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Arbor Vitae

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This watch was delivered in a matter of a few days. It was exactly what I wanted. I have a slim wrist, and it fits perfectly. It's not clunky at all, even with the larger face. Nice neutral blue. Very easy to read instructions on how to set. I 100% recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hyman

customer_reviews.title: My choice for the third time.
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch because It's easy to read, keeps perfect time, has other functions I use on occasion and looks fine. The only annoying problem is that the watch band breaks long before the watch or battery die. I have had to replace the watch every two years when the band breaks, and consequently have two in a drawer and one on my arm, all still working perfectly. It's also a little tricky to set the watch in twelve hour time rather than 24 hour a day time and the directions don't address this problem, But for the money it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Celeste Lenth

customer_reviews.title: Bought at Christmas.  Battery dead by mid February
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch for what it is. I got it for my wife to have a cheap durable watch to work out on or take the kids to the pool. She definitely liked it. The battery was dead within 2.5 months, though. Given replacing the battery is about 50% of the cost of the watch and a big hassle, I'm gong with one star. That said, maybe I just got a dud that sat in the warehouse for 2 years - I would have given 5 stars if the battery lasted.
customer_reviews.author: K. Durham

customer_reviews.title: very nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: I use this watch as a reminder for my medicine. It takes some time to get the buttons memorized but the instructions that come with the watch are clear. I don't know why but I bump the bottom left button often so have to press it three more times to get it back to time and date BUT ITS WORTH IT for the features. I have to have it on for the alarm and its held up to dishes, showers, baths and not easy to scratch as it doesn't even have a scuff yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the best. I’ve had it for over 5 years and i lifeguard and teach swim lessons so I’m in the water a lot. The watch works perfect in the water and I’ve never had a problem. Easy to use and read the time. The buckle keeps it secure in place so it never falls off my wrist even when I’m swimming or performing a save. The only problem I have is that the band faded but that’s because I’m in the sun for 5+ hours every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Elegant little watch
customer_reviews.text: Haven't wear a watch for more than 10 years; I'm picky I guess! This watch appealed to me somehow; was expected it to be a little bigger but I guess watchmakers think small for women! The band is the exact color of the picture (pale grey-bluish). The date was already set up, just the hours to set for me; easy set up nonetheless. Hopefully, I will keep longer this time or that the band will not break off easily. One question is: Is there a wristband that fits this watch? I guess I will find out down the line. For now, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Athanase

customer_reviews.title: I had a black one and I loved it for work
customer_reviews.text: I had a black one and I loved it for work, since my hospital uses military time and I work overnights. So to be able to switch back and forth was really convenient. (Not that it's hard to figure out what time it was on either clock, just nice to glimpse and write numbers without thinking.) But it held up for about a year before the constant and sanitation and washing wore out the straps. So I got the white and gold this time and I really think it's beautiful and simple and still easy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, inexpensive watch
customer_reviews.text: For the price- this watch is great! I have had it now for about a month. I purchased it as my 'pool watch'. It is cute enough, water proof and tells time. Perfect. There are a few things that could done to improve it, like not have 'China' stamped in the inside end of the strap which can be seen by me. Or if the buckle matched the face instead of being silver. But again, for the price, I can't complain. Also, the face is pretty small, the size of a quarter, which for my child-like wrists is perfect. I would buy it again in a heartbeat and am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a birthday gift (well, at her request!) It's a nice-looking watch and not too bulky as some sports watches are. She had one for years, wore it training for triathlons, bicycling and camping (nice to have the illuminated dial) and finally wore it out. Great if you just want the basic functions.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first sport watch in a few years and I'm loving it. It's cute and functional. I've worn it nonstop and it's comfortable and holding up in the shower. The band doesn't absorb water and K's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Band changed color in less than 20 days!
customer_reviews.text: Although the watch portion functions well, the band has changed from WHITE to faded grays in different areas (see pictures). You can see in the picture that I purchased this on May 1, 2020. I received it on May 9, 2020. I took these pictures on May 25, 2020. Less than 20 days and the band has completely changed colors. I’d like to add that I haven’t worn any kind of new jeans or clothing that would change the color due to excess pigment in the clothing. This was just from regular old cloths. If you’re going to get this watch, I would STRONGLY discourage you from getting any light colored one (which sucks for spring and summer).
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P

customer_reviews.title: Works looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but the band makes it look toy like & cheap I mean it was cheap ... it does it's job so far... but if you're looking for something a little nicer I'd look somewhere else The only thing I don't really like is the band is attached to watch face and it is not able to move (vs. other watches the band usually seems attached on a hinge) but overall it's okay I wear it for work
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. With the directions sent it's relatively easy to set the correct time, etc. I've washed my hands a few times, no problems there yet. I like it's size because it's not bulky on my wrist, and the blue band is a pretty blue. However, it's face does slide away from me on my wrist, even when tightened. Also, at the end of the band it says "China". If I don't slide the "band holder" near the end it's pretty visible. If it has to say China it should be somewhere less visible. Overall, so far, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: PageTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to watch. It has all of the features that I need. Tells the time in either 12hr or 24hr format. Has an alarm clock. Can be used as a stop watch. Has a light so you can see the time in the dark. The only issue is that the plastic band wears aware from use and eventually will break off from the point where you fastened the watch most often. I can attest to this because this is the 5th of this type of watch that I've owned. However, for the price and functionality, It's my go to watch and I will continue to buy a new one every time the band breaks, every 1-2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Armitron Sport Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simple, light weight, not too big and tells time which is all I needed out of it. I've also accidentally stepped in the shower with it on my wrist and it was just fine so it seems like the water resistance is real. One thing I have noticed is that the white rubber tends to pick up color. It's absorbed some ink from my wrist resting against my notes. Might go with a black strap whenever I replace it.
customer_reviews.author: J-magnum

customer_reviews.title: Great but don't get the white one!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing it night and day for several months now and it as held up surprisingly well. It is definitely waterproof, I have even worn it in the pool all day and it was fine. It looked great initially, but only thing is the white part did not stay white for long. In fact, it looks very dingy and is mostly a gross uneven grey color now. I lost the instructions and had no idea how to change the time, but I was able to look them up on Armitron's website. I will probably purchase another one, just not white.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Helfenbein

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This watch does the job, it keeps time and has a stop watch and a light function to see in the dark. I find it easy to switch from time to stop watch and easy to change the time. I think it looks great too. One thing I don't like is that the band, to keep the strap from flapping around, shifts every time I wear it and I have to keep putting it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The product is durable, good quality and is as described. Purchased for two children, one in elementary school and the other in middle school. The watch fits well on both, who are of slender build. There is plenty of length left in the watch band for someone of a larger build, or a woman to use. Also, it seems to be an excellent overall size (proportionate).
customer_reviews.author: In my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Silver part is shiny, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife who works in the ED. She needed a watch that was functional, easy to clean, and looked nice. This fits the bill well. and she has not had any issues with it whatsoever. Our only complaint is that the silver part is very shiny and looks cheap. The picture makes it seem like a brushed metal look, but it is not. Keep that in mind before buying. Overall, I recommend the watch for the purpose of having a cheap functional watch that is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Dark wash jeans stain band
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. Easy to use and read. Got the white one and loved it UNTIL I WORE DARK WASH JEANS. The band got stained and not even straight bleach could remove it. Unfortunately, as a result I only wore it for a week before the staining occured. If you're planning on ever wearing dark wash jeans and the white strap version of this watch, think again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof watch is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Watch works great. Bought it for a Caribbean cruise where I was planning on being in the water a lot and needed to make sure I got back on the boat before it left. It was perfectly waterproof for my snorkeling needs. It says NOT to press any buttons while in the water which makes perfectly good sense. Dressy enough to wear out at night. Only problem is the directions were NOT written by someone with English as a primary language. YouTube has multiple videos about how to operate a four button Armitron watch - flip to them for a couple of minutes..
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but old battery
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for my 12 y/o daughter, cute but not too young for her. I took a star off because after 1.5 months, the battery died and you can't replace the battery yourself because you have to take the band off to get the back off so I paid 1/2 the price of the watch to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant but also cute watch
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter loves this watch. It is cute and not chunky. She wears it every day she works at a summer camp and even swims twice a day with it on. The colors she got (very light blue strap and rose gold) were true to the colors advertised in the picture. We would buy this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great but stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I wear my watches every day and thought I'd try a girlier band. I love the color but it discolored after only a few weeks. In 2-3 months it was basically the color in the picture. Nothing works to remove it, I tried cleaner and soap and magic erasers and alcohol and even laundry stain remover. It's been 5 months now and I finally got around to replacing it. 5 stars for everything except the staining.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Screen stopped working within a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since my last cheap watch is looking a bit old after 5 years. The screen on this one stopped working after less than a month, with the numbers no longer properly displaying. I only wore this for a few shifts as a nurse, so I did wash my hands a lot, but that is all and shouldn't hurt a water-resistant watch. Certainly can't recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: In spite of much effort, never worked.
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning the battery was dead. Took to batteries plus twice and finally got a working battery for ten bucks. Tried to adjust and the top left button for settings wouldn't work. I bought it for my daughter who doesn't get the importance of speedy resolution and keeping the packaging, so no we never got any use out of it ever and it can only go in the trash. Could have resolved via Amazon if we moved faster and would likely have gotten a working watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: just ok.  easy to read. and i like the way it looks.  good price as well.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and it is easy to read which is what i wanted. Still haven't figured out all the controls, but I don't think its that bad. the big negative - is that after wearing this for at most two days, I already got two small scratches right across the middle of the face. And i'm not particularly active so no idea how that happened. I guess the face is cheap plastic so maybe its inevitable. or maybe i am just very hard on watches, but i think its the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great. It's stylish for this type of watch
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. It's stylish for this type of watch, people always tell me "I love your watch!". I have submerged it in water for short periods (giving my daughter a bath when I forgot to take it off) and it works no problem after that. I don't expect it to last long because of the price & the type of watch, but so far so good. I'll buy this again when it conks out.
customer_reviews.author: MSP

customer_reviews.title: Great Watches
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Armitron watch, and I still love them. They're tough enough to take a few knocks, but are also small and nice enough to look good. The only con I've had with them is the backlight dies off pretty quick, but that's not a dealbreaker for me. I've previously had the teal/silver and a white/pink, and just purchased the navy/rose gold (though I will say the metal is more copper than rose gold). I fully plan on buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I have ever owned. I've bathed kids while wearing it, gardened, cleaned , this watch is unstoppable. Strap cleans right up with rubbing alcohol or just plain soapy water. Perfect size and comfortable to wear all day . Google Search this watch and download manual. Recommended since watch has several functions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The metal finish of the frame seems unaffected/in good form. I still like it and feel fancy ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review 5 weeks after having received the item. As others have reviewed, the white band has changed color within a few months to an off-white. However, I don't care because you wouldn't notice the color change against my skin tone. You would only notice if you compared it next to a stark white background. The metal finish of the frame seems unaffected/in good form. I still like it and feel fancy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Arnazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic digital watch to put on my walker. Other watches I received had to many 'other' functions - A stop watch? Needs daily charging? I don't need a stop watch function! Daily charging? Just a basic battery please! Watches are supposed to just constantly provide the time right? This watch provides a digital constant read out of the exact time!! YEAH!!
customer_reviews.author: maryann sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with a great price. I love the fact that it tells me both the day of the week, and the day of the month. So many times, I have asked my husband what day is it, and he gives me the day of the month. I wanted to know the day of the week. Why is it so hard for me to keep track of the day of the week, because I’m no longer working. I have poor eye sight and the digital watch is very easy to read. The dark navy blue goes with everything that I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Battery died!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the watch, but I have had it less than a month and have already had to replace the battery. When I received it, it was running, so I have no idea how long the battery would have lasted, but that made it less attractive. I also am having a hard time setting the calendar. The watch itself fits well and is very comfortable. I like the fact that it has a back light and the numerals are easy to read. If I hadn't had to spend an additional $9 to keep it running, I would probably give it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Rose Gold
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the color around the watch face is definitely a very shiny rose gold rather than the matte gold that I expected from the picture (it does say so in the description). I did not like that the fastener on the wristband is just silver, so it does not match. I cannot speak to how waterproof this watch is yet, but the insert that came with it says that it is only water-resistant. My final complaint is that "CHINA" is printed in black on inside of the strap's end, so that when it is on and fastened, "CHINA" is visible when I look at the watch face (see picture). I'm not sure if I'll be returning or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch, easy to use and fits both a small and large wrist
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to set up and read, fits any size of wrist. Most watches are made for 7.5” wrists-far far too big for me. This band has enough holes to adjust the length for a tiny wrist or a very large one. Not to mention this is a very good looking watch-feminine and delicate yet functional. Can’t comment on longevity yet as I just got it. But so far very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MilosMom

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life. Otherwise great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wash to use. However the battery on mine went out after one year. Try to replace the battery and turns out it did not bring it back to life. So please keep that in mind. If you use the Warranty, you need to pay a return fee so it is not going to be a free repair out of it. The watch works fine, but just please be aware of it
customer_reviews.author: BWill

customer_reviews.title: All pretty things are flawed
customer_reviews.text: It's a great watch for the price. The white/gold combo looks classy and sporty so it's also a great versatile accessory. I've received a lot of compliments on it. The fit is not comfortable. The silicone is a bit thick, so the band slips out of the buckle secure loop. It also needs to be worn one notch looser otherwise the band rubs, which makes the face turn backwards. It's pretty durable though! I do dishes often, have worn it swimming; It even survived a week long trip in Yellowstone! It got a little smudgy looking, but I cleaned it up and it still looks great. The light also died a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anni P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lights up, and tons of features. Really cute too! I love the color! 🙂💙
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I love the fact that it can light up to read the time in the dark. I have showered with it on with no problems. It's definitely water resistant. Lots of great functions...I still need to figure out the timer, but I'm sure reading the instruction manual will solve that. Overall, I'm very happy with my new watch! 🙂💜
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old who wears her watch nearly 24/7. Unfortunately during the first week the metal clasp fell off and could no longer be worn. I contacted the seller and had a new watch a few days later without having to return the original. I was very impressed with the customer service and hope the issue with the first watch was just a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: kjfox04

product_meta.title: Armitron Sport Women's 45/7012 Digital Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
Quartz movement with digital multifuntional display




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Item model number :45/7012BLK
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 17, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Armitron Sport
 * ASIN :B004J30ERI

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,147 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #1 inWomen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #2 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #1 inWomen's Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars5,281 ratings Quartz movement with digital multifuntional display
feature_bullets: Sport watch featuring alarm, chronograph, second time zone function, engraved case back, and black pushers
26.93 millimeter resin case with acrylic dial window
Japanese quartz movement with digital display
Black resin band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 100 meter (330 feet): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
